xerces-c.Description: Xerces-C++ is a XML parser, for parsing, generating, manipulating, and validating XML documents using the DOM, SAX, and SAX2 APIs.

xeus.Description: C++ implementation of the Jupyter kernel protocol

xlnt.Description: Cross-platform user-friendly xlsx library for C++14

xmlsec.Description: XML Security Library is a C library based on LibXML2. The library supports major XML security standards.

xorstr.Description: Heavily vectorized c++17 compile time string encryption

xproperty.Description: Traitlets-like C++ properties and implementation of the observer pattern

xsimd.Description: Modern, portable C++ wrappers for SIMD intrinsics

xtensor.Description: C++ tensors with broadcasting and lazy computing

xtensor-fftw.Description: FFTW bindings for the xtensor C++14 multi-dimensional array library

xtensor-io.Description: xtensor plugin to read and write images, audio files, numpy (compressed) npz and HDF5

yas.Description: Yet Another Serialization is a header only serialization library

yasm.Description: Yasm is a complete rewrite of the NASM assembler under the “new” BSD License.

yato.Description: Modern C++14 containers and utilities, actors system, typesafe config

yoga.Description: Yoga is a cross-platform layout engine which implements Flexbox

websockets-sha1.Description: Enable WebSocket transport through builtin sha1 (libzmq#3676)

zfp.Description: Zfp is an open source C/C++ library for compressed numerical arrays that support high throughput read and write random access. zfp also supports streaming compression of integer and floating-point data, e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and from disk. zfp is primarily written in C and C++ but also includes Python and Fortran bindings.

zydis.Description: Fast and lightweight x86/x86-64 disassembler library.

zziplib.Description: library providing read access on ZIP-archives
